biocontainers.name: danpos
biocontainers.summary: A toolkit for dynamic analysis of nucleosome and protein occupancy by sequencing, version 2

biotools.summary: Designed for genome-wide comparative analysis of nucleosome maps. It detect single-nucleotide-resolution change in positions(location), enrichment (occupancy), and fuzziness (phasing, positioning) of each nucleosome unit.

bioschemas.name: DANPOS
bioschemas.summary: Designed for genome-wide comparative analysis of nucleosome maps. It detect single-nucleotide-resolution change in positions(location), enrichment (occupancy), and fuzziness (phasing, positioning) of each nucleosome unit.
